epp:phrases.epp:phrase: Set Parameters for the current Theme
This is further text about Theme Admin.

This tool is designed to help repository admins update their theme. The properties below are saved as phrases. This tool writes modified phrases to zz_webcfg.xml. Click the phrase text to edit it. Javascript required. Once the new value is saved, restarting the web sever may be required.
If you wish to update the logo from the default, you can follow the instructions on the eprints wiki.

epp:phrase.p: Select from the installed themes. Only Docklands compatable themes will be shown here. Other themes will have to be select in the usual way, by editing a file in the cfg.d folder.
